PH: National DaySaturday, 21 August 2021 is not a public holiday.
Labour DayMonday, 2 May 2022, will be a public holiday if your rest day falls on 1 May 2022.
Vesak DayMonday, 16 May 2022, will be a public holiday if your rest day falls on 15 May 2022.
Hari Raya HajiMonday, 11 July 2022, will be a public holiday if your rest day falls on 10 July 2022.
Christmas DayMonday, 26 December 2022, will be a public holiday if your rest day falls on 25 December 2022.
